description: Haɗu da dandamali kuma ku ƙara yin aiki tare da kayan aikin ƙira na AI, Duk an ƙera su don sauƙaƙe aikinku, sauri da inganci fiye da kowane lokaci.
f_header_desc: The Architects Platform wani yanke shawara ne da aka ƙera don magance ƙalubalen da haɓaka damar masu gine-gine da masu zane.
f_content_desc: Dandali ne mai ƙarfin AI wanda ke ƙarfafa ƙwararru da masu sha'awar a fagen gine-gine da ƙira ta hanyar ba da fasali da kayan aiki iri-iri.
f_tabs_1_desc: Dandalin mu yana taimaka wa masu ginin gine-gine wajen samar da ra'ayoyin ƙira, bayar da ra'ayi, da bayar da shawarwari.
f_tabs_2_desc: Muna taimaka muku samar da ra'ayoyin ƙirƙira, bayar da abubuwan ban sha'awa, da kuma daidaita ƙirarku ta farko ta hanyar amsa tattaunawa.
f_tabs_3: Binciken Kasuwa da Ƙimar Ƙimar Kasuwa
f_tabs_3_desc: The Architects Platform yana daidaita tsare-tsare na kudi ta hanyar taimakawa wajen samar da ingantattun kididdigar farashi da kasafin kuɗi don ayyukan gine-gine.
fb_item_1: Tsarin ƙira na farko da ƙira mai ban sha'awa
fb_item_1_desc: Ya kamata aikace-aikacen ya samar da ra'ayi na ƙira bisa shigar da maginin akan buƙatun abokin ciniki da sauran ƙuntatawa kamar wuri, kasafin kuɗi da kuma samar da ƙira mai ban sha'awa.
fb_item_2: An Gina Cikin Kayan Zane da Zane
fb_item_2_desc: Masu amfani za su sami damar ginawa a cikin ƙira da zayyana kayan aikin inda za su iya ba da ra'ayoyinsu ga maginin don samun ra'ayi, shawarwari da bambancin ƙira.
fb_item_3_desc: Mai ginin gine-gine yana taimakawa wajen zayyana abubuwan ciki na gidaje da gine-gine ta hanyar samar da kayayyaki da kuma saitin kayan aiki da kayan daki tare da hanzari ba tare da buƙatar zane da yin komai ba
fb_item_4: Ƙirƙirar ƙira na ciki da cikar kayan daki
fb_item_4_desc: An yi zane-zane a kan dandali kuma an samar da su daga masu amfani kamar yadda ake mayar da hotuna zuwa ma'ana ta zahiri cikin daƙiƙa guda.
fb_item_5_desc: Mai ginin gine-ginen zai taimaka wajen tsarawa da gyare-gyaren ƙira da aka riga aka yi da kuma zane-zane bisa gaggauwa da kuma bayar da shawarwari da bambancin ƙira
fb_item_6_desc: Bisa kan ƙira da ƙayyadaddun buƙatu Mai ginin gine-ginen yana taimakawa ta hanyar nazarin buƙatun ƙira da ƙididdige farashin gini kuma yana ba da ƙarin rahusa mafita.
h_header_1: An Yi Zane Mai Sauƙi Da
h_header_desc: Tsarin da ke da ƙarfin AI wanda ke taimakawa da ƙarfafa ƙwararru da masu sha'awar a fannin gine-gine da ƙira ta hanyar ba da fasali da kayan aiki iri-iri.
mb_header: Yi aiki da sauri daga ko'ina
mb_header_desc: Ku ci gaba da sabuntawa, ƙira ku ci gaba da aiki tare da The Architects akan iOS & Android. Zazzage ƙa'idar a yau.
pr_header_desc: A nan a Innovate Fusion muna mai da hankali kan gine-ginen gine-gine inda fasaha, kirkire-kirkire, da jari za su iya buɗe kimar dogon lokaci da haɓaka haɓakar tattalin arziki.
r_header: Ban san me zan yi da ku ba
r_header_desc: Don sake saita kalmar wucewa, da fatan za a shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku.
r_ques: Ba ni da asusu, ba ni da asusu.
s_welcome: Barka da dawowa. Mun kasance don yin
su_welcome: Barka da zuwa. Mun wanzu don yin
su_create: Ta hanyar ƙirƙirar asusu, kun yarda da
su_already: Tuni ana amfani da The Architect?
pa_continue: Ta danna ci gaba, kun yarda da mu
